description: Jake Gyllenhaal gave his fans a special treat while taking part in Tom Holland's handstand challenge.
title: Jake Gyllenhaal crushed Tom Holland's handstand challenge and the internet is loving it
title_page: Jake Gyllenhaal crushed Tom Holland's handstand challenge and the internet is loving it - CNN
maintext:
(CNN) Jake Gyllenhaal gave his fans a special treat while taking part in Tom Holland's handstand challenge.
Holland nominated Gyllenhaal to try holding the upside-down stance while putting on a T-shirt. Gyllenhaal did it -- while making it look too easy.
Sorry I'm late to our Zoom meeting, I was watching Jake Gyllenhaal put on a shirt while in a handstand. pic.twitter.com/UIlV5Wihyv â€” MTV (@MTV) April 2, 2020
"Wait. @tomholland2013 What's the challenge??? Shirtless heavy breathing??" Gyllenhaal teased his "Spider-Man: Far From Home" co-star.
Holland's original video shows him struggling to put on a shirt. After he finally manages it, he drops to the ground while trying to catch his breath.
Gyllenhaal fans on the internet were more than happy with his video.
